import React, { Component } from "react"; import AnimakitRotator from "animakit-rotator"; import Loader from "react-loader-spinner"; export class Contact extends Component { render() { return (

Get In Touch

Please fill out the form below to send us an email and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

Contact Info

Address {this.props.data ? this.props.data.address : "loading"}

Phone {" "} {this.props.data ? this.props.data.phone : "loading"}

Email {" "} {this.props.data ? this.props.data.email : "loading"}

© Copyright 2020 MegaFlow Technologies. All Rights Reserved{" "} MegaFlow

); } } export default Contact;
